bike.description: S-Works Shiv FACT IS 11r carbon, FACT IS construction, crosswind-optimized airfoils, 1-1/8" lower bearing, OSBB, Control Tower Fit System, Fuelselage Integrated Hydration System

components.description: Specialized FACT Aero carbon monocoque fork, carbon steerer and crown for 1-1/8" bearing
1-1/8" upper and lower, stainless steel cartridge bearings
S-Works FACT carbon, w/ TT chainrings
Chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owner's manual
